name: review1
title: House of Lasagna
description: It has some what a fancy feel to it, but its a small restaurant with a small menu.

name: review2
title: Pho-Chicken Noodle Soup
description: The staff was amazing very friendly and welcoming. Making everyone feel like family. It was a homy feel at Johns. I will be back for more.

name: review3
title: Guacamole
description: This is my 2nd favorite 'go to' Mexican place in the East Bay next to Los Panchos in Pacheco/Danville. Great food, lots of variety, fair prices, great quality.  Friendly staff and easy to order online or over the phone.  We love the BCR's and great bean dip.

name: review4
title: Hamburger
description: This place is a great choice if you are looking for a solid burger in Jersey City. I came here this evening and it wasn't to busy. Usually it is pretty packed during peak hours. We were seated immediately when we got in. They have outside seating options as well for those who like to sit outside.
